Field Label: I feel safe walking in my neighborhood, day or night.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1 , Strongly Agree|2 , Agree|3 , Neutral (neither agree nor disagree)|4 , Disagree|5 , Strongly Disagree

Field Label: Violence is not a problem in my neighborhood.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1 , Strongly Agree|2 , Agree|3 , Neutral (neither agree nor disagree)|4 , Disagree|5 , Strongly Disagree

Field Label: My neighborhood is safe from crime.
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1 , Strongly Agree|2 , Agree|3 , Neutral (neither agree nor disagree)|4 , Disagree|5 , Strongly Disagree

Field Label:
Scoring Instructions

A total score can be obtained by computing the average of the three items. Lower scores indicate more neighborhood safety.
